title: Help me get my account back !!
body:
I have been hacked by a person whos email ends like this: ENDHIAF@YAHOO.COM. 
Everytime I try to switch email or password I have to verify a passcode sent to that email................
He has my username and password so he can use it whenever he wants too! Please help me

replies.body: Hello! You'll need to create a ticket here for the proper assistance! https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
Ty bro, I have created a ticket <3

Unfortunately, we're unable to assist with sensitive account issues on the boards.  As I Only Kayle suggested, please reach out to our account team by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they will be more than happy to help out.  I recommend reviewing our[ Account Recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide to prepare for any questions you may be asked.  Rest easy knowing you'll be in good hands!
